entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tracadie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 9:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -18.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -20.9°C
Wind: WSW 25 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries along the Strait. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Flurries along the Strait. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Flurries along the Strait in the evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
